long_description: Get core protection on your hikes with the men's Marmot Leadville Vest. Its GORE-TEX(R) WINDSTOPPER(R) soft-shell fabric is windproof, water resistant and breathable, so you stay warm. Choose the Leadville for dry, moderate-to-cold weather and for moderate aerobic activities. WINDSTOPPER fabric eliminates windchill, yet it's breathable and quickly dissipates excess moisture to keep you dry and warm. Venting side panels offer comfortable stretch and increase breathability. Full-length front zipper features an inner draft flap; DriClime(R)-lined chin guard and collar are soft against skin. Hem drawcord seals in heat. Zippered handwarmer pockets and chest pocket; interior zip pocket. Angel-Wing Movement(TM) sleeves allow unrestricted range of motion. Marmot Leadville Vest for men features reflective logos for increased safety in low-light conditions.
short_description: Get core protection on your hikes with the men's Marmot Leadville Vest. Its GORE-TEX(R) WINDSTOPPER(R) soft-shell fabric is windproof, water resistant and breathable, so you stay warm.
